20101228070533.000|20101228070536.000|CC1|SHOWING UP FOR DECORATING.      
20101228070536.000|20101228070537.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HE SAYS IF WRIT TO 
20101228070537.000|20101228070540.000|CC1|RAIN ON ROSE PARADE DAY, THERE  
20101228070540.000|20101228070541.000|CC1|ARE SOME CALCULATIONS THAT HAVE 
20101228070541.000|20101228070542.000|CC1|TO BE MADE.                     
20101228070542.000|20101228070544.000|CC1|>> THE DEW POINT IN THE AIR     
20101228070544.000|20101228070545.000|CC1|AFFECTS THE WEIGHT OF MUMS ONCE 
20101228070545.000|20101228070547.000|CC1|THEY'RE ON A FLOAT.             
20101228070547.000|20101228070549.000|CC1|A HALF MILLION FLOWER HEADS ON A
20101228070549.000|20101228070550.000|CC1|FLOAT THAT EACH GAIN A LITTLE   
20101228070550.000|20101228070551.000|CC1|WEIGHT WITH WATER AND IT IS     
20101228070551.000|20101228070553.000|CC1|FACTORED IN.                    
20101228070553.000|20101228070554.000|CC1|SUDDENLY YOU HAVE AN EXTRA HALF 
20101228070554.000|20101228070555.000|CC1|TON OF WEIGHT.                  
20101228070555.000|20101228070556.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHILE DEW POINT IS 
20101228070556.000|20101228070558.000|CC1|A FACTOR HERE, TOTAL RAINFALL IS
20101228070558.000|20101228070602.000|CC1|A FACTOR IN THE FOOTHILL        
20101228070602.000|20101228070603.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOODS OF FLINT RIDGE LA 
20101228070603.000|20101228070605.000|CC1|CANADA IN CASE THE DEBRIS BASINS
20101228070605.000|20101228070608.000|CC1|DON'T DO THEIR JOB, THE HOLD THE
20101228070608.000|20101228070611.000|CC1|BOULDERS, TREES AND MUD COMING  
20101228070611.000|20101228070613.000|CC1|OFF THE BURN AREAS.             
20101228070613.000|20101228070614.000|CC1|EARLIER TODAY THE PUBLIC WORKS  
20101228070614.000|20101228070616.000|CC1|CREWS STARTED CLEARING OUT THE  
20101228070616.000|20101228070616.000|CC1|BASIN.                          
20101228070616.000|20101228070619.000|CC1|IT IS FILLED TO 20% CAPACITY IN 
20101228070619.000|20101228070621.000|CC1|THE LAST STORM.                 
20101228070621.000|20101228070622.000|CC1|BACK AT THE SCENIC DECORATING   
20101228070622.000|20101228070624.000|CC1|WAREHOUSE IN PASADENA, THE STORM
20101228070624.000|20101228070626.000|CC1|BACK EAST ARE A SPECIAL CONCERN 
20101228070626.000|20101228070629.000|CC1|FOR THE DONATE LIFE FLOAT WHICH 
20101228070629.000|20101228070631.000|CC1|IS SUPPOSED TO HAVE 26 RIDERS.  
20101228070631.000|20101228070632.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE INDIVIDUALS FLYING   
20101228070632.000|20101228070634.000|CC1|OUT FROM NEW YORK, FROM         
20101228070634.000|20101228070637.000|CC1|ILLINOIS, AND SO WHAT'S GOING ON
20101228070637.000|20101228070639.000|CC1|IS HAPPENING ON THE EAST COAST. 
20101228070639.000|20101228070640.000|CC1|WE CANNOT GET SOME OF OUR PEOPLE
20101228070640.000|20101228070641.000|CC1|OUT HERE.                       
20101228070641.000|20101228070642.000|CC1|>> MOST OF THE RIDERS WERE      
20101228070642.000|20101228070644.000|CC1|SELECTED A YEAR IN ADVANCE AND  
20101228070644.000|20101228070645.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THE NATURE OF THE    
20101228070645.000|20101228070647.000|CC1|FLOAT, SUBSTITUTING RIDERS IS   
20101228070647.000|20101228070650.000|CC1|NOT EASILY DONE.                
20101228070650.000|20101228070652.000|CC1|>> MOST OF THE INDIVIDUALS ARE  
20101228070652.000|20101228070654.000|CC1|RIDING BECAUSE THEY ARE AN ORGAN
20101228070654.000|20101228070656.000|CC1|RECIPIENT, A TISSUE RECIPIENT,

20101228070717.000|20101228070747.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101228070717.000|20101228070719.000|CC1|>>> THIS SHOULD BE A BIG WEEK   
20101228070719.000|20101228070721.000|CC1|FOR THE MOUNTAIN RESORTS, PLACES
20101228070721.000|20101228070723.000|CC1|LIKE BIG BEAR, BUT IT IS GETTING
20101228070723.000|20101228070724.000|CC1|THERE THAT IS A PROBLEM BECAUSE 
20101228070724.000|20101228070726.000|CC1|HIGHWAY 330 IS CLOSED.          
20101228070726.000|20101228070728.000|CC1|HERE'S THE PROBLEM FROM THE     
20101228070728.000|20101228070730.000|CC1|GIANT SINKHOLE THAT TOOK AWAY A 
20101228070730.000|20101228070731.000|CC1|SIZABLE PORTION OF THE PAVEMENT 
20101228070731.000|20101228070732.000|CC1|AND THERE IS NO WAY AROUND IT.  
20101228070732.000|20101228070734.000|CC1|IT IS SO MASSIVE THAT CALTRANS  
20101228070734.000|20101228070736.000|CC1|SAID THERE IS A GOOD CHANCE THIS
20101228070736.000|20101228070738.000|CC1|HIGHWAY WILL REMAIN CLOSED FOR  
20101228070738.000|20101228070739.000|CC1|WEEKS IF NOT MONTHS.

20101228070740.000|20101228070742.000|CC1|HAS TO BE SHORED UP AND THE     
20101228070742.000|20101228070744.000|CC1|GROUND NEEDS TO BE VERY DRY     
20101228070744.000|20101228070747.000|CC1|BEFORE THAT CAN BE DONE.        
20101228070747.000|20101228070813.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101228070747.000|20101228070750.000|CC1|>>> EASTER EGG AT CHRISTMAS?    
20101228070750.000|20101228070752.000|CC1|APPARENTLY CUSTOMS AGENTS
